title: Battleaxe +1
content:
Battleaxe +1 Uncommon 2~11 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+1 Slashing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The intricate engravings on this axe's blade and handle make plain the skill of its smith.. Battleaxe Versatile 1.8 600

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d10 (1d8)+1 Slashing

The intricate engravings on this axe's blade and handle make plain the skill of its smith..
